modName: Vampire Beast Blood Ring left hand
summary: Ever looked at the vampire Blood Rings and thought why can\'t I wear Both of these awesome things at the same time? Well now you can!
descriptionHtml:
Ever looked at the vampire Blood Rings and thought why can\'t I wear Both of these awesome things at the same time? Well now you can!

(only visible in third person, I\'m attempting to find a method that works on first person as well, any help with that would be appreciated.)

Based on \"Left Hand Rings by duggelz\" and fully compatible! (though no assets from his mod were used in the making of this one.)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21720
author: jjeeff185
